attributes.action: Vaccinate teachers against covid in the February half term!
attributes.additional_details: The government have the power to move teachers up the covid vaccination list.
attributes.background: Vaccinate all teachers in the February half term against covid so teachers are protected from covid from those students who have to attend. Also schools may be able reopen and more children can get back to learning sooner!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
